description: Try our easy to follow Mini Falafels With Seed & Kale Tabbouleh recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Falafels With Seed & Kale Tabbouleh Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tabbouleh, process seeds and nuts together in a food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Process kale until finely chopped. Add to nut mix with herbs and onion. Whisk juice, oil, sumac and half the garlic together. Pour over tabbouleh. Stir through well.

Process chickpeas, quinoa flakes, coriander, cumin and remaining garlic in a food processor until roughly chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Divide into 12 portions, roll into balls and flatten.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook falafels for 5 minutes or until golden. Serve with chargrilled lemon and tabbouleh.
